description: very large seated man at center playing a small concertina; grimacing woman and baby at right, with another child seated at her feet; stooped woman holding the hand of a child pulling a small wagon at left; man wearing a beret at left; farm houses in background
marks: Signature and Title LRC, in the print, in brown: [A Kubin / Ser Musika
title: The Musician, from "Phantasy in Bohemia"
